metadata.description: Name of the Function App to call.

inputs.body:
DeviceFileEvents
| where ActionType == "FileCreated"
| where DeviceId == "@{body('Parse_JSON_-_Each_Host')?['additionalData']?['MdatpDeviceId']}"
| where FileName == "@{items('For_each_-_Find_file_path_on_the_target_host')?['properties']?['fileName']}" and FileName !endswith ".lnk"
| project FolderPath, FileName
| distinct FolderPath, FileName

body.message:
The file was not uploaded to Azure Blob Storage.


Check the status of your Storage Account "@{variables('Storage Account Name')}" and Container "@{variables('Container Name')}" in Azure Blob Storage.

ANY.RUN Sandbox Analysis Started:
Analysis of the file (@{items('For_each_-_Find_file_path_on_the_target_host')?['properties']?['fileName']}) has been initiated in ANY.RUN Sandbox.


Link to interactive report: https://app.any.run/tasks/@{variables('UUID')}

The OS platform "@{body('Machines_-_Get_single_machine')?['osPlatform']}" of the host "@{body('Machines_-_Get_single_machine')?['computerDnsName']}" is not supported for analysis in ANY.RUN Sandbox.


Please try to start analysis manually.

ANY.RUN File Detonation Results:
A potencial malicious File has been detected during analysis in ANY.RUN Sandbox (@{items('For_each_-_Find_file_path_on_the_target_host')?['properties']?['fileName']}).


Verdict: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_Task_Monitor')?['task']?['scores']?['verdict']?['text']}
Threat score: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_ANYRUN_Report')?['data']?['analysis']?['scores']?['verdict']?['score']}/100
Link to interactive report: https://app.any.run/tasks/@{variables('UUID')}


Detected IOCs:
@{outputs('Compose_IOC_Table')}

ANY.RUN File Detonation Results:
File is clean and no malicious activity was found during analysis in ANY.RUN Sandbox (@{variables('Suspicious File - FileName')}).


Link to analysis report: https://app.any.run/tasks/@{variables('UUID')}

contains: File uploaded to Blob Storage successfully

body.message:
Live response session has been pending for 1hr after multiple attempts to initiate the live response and await a response. Terminating the session due to a possibly offline device.


Device ID: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_Each_Host')?['additionalData']?['MdatpDeviceId']}


Live Response URI: https://api.securitycenter.microsoft.com/api/machineactions/@{body('Actions_-_Get_single_machine_action')?['id']}/GetLiveResponseResultDownloadLink(index=0)

inputs.uri: @concat('https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/', variables('Subscription ID'), '/resourceGroups/', variables('Resource Group Name'), '/providers/Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/', variables('Storage Account Name'), '/listServiceSas?api-version=2021-04-01')

body.Comment: Live Response to upload suspicious file to Blob Stotage

body.message:
The file was not found at the host.


No antivirus alerts with the specified file name "@{items('For_each_-_Find_file_path_on_the_target_host')?['properties']?['fileName']}" were found on the host. Please check your query parameters.

body.Comment: Scanning this device as part of sentinel incident - @{triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['incidentNumber']}

body.message: Anti-virus scan is currently pending. Possibly due to the device being offline or connectivity issues.

ANY.RUN Sandbox Analysis Started:
Analysis of the URL (@{item()?['Url']}) has been initiated in ANY.RUN Sandbox.


Link to analysis report: https://app.any.run/tasks/@{variables('UUID')}

ANY.RUN URL Detonation Results:
A malicious URL has been detected during ANY.RUN Sandbox analysis (@{replace(replace(item()?['Url'], '.', '[.]'), 'https://', '')}).


Verdict: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_Task_Monitor_URL')?['task']?['scores']?['verdict']?['text']}
Threat score: @{body('Parse_JSON_-_ANYRUN_Report_URL')?['data']?['analysis']?['scores']?['verdict']?['score']}/100
Link to analysis report: https://app.any.run/tasks/@{variables('UUID')}


Detected IOCs:
@{outputs('Compose_IOC_Table_URL')}

ANY.RUN URL Detonation Results:
URL is clean and is no malicious activity was found during detonation via ANY.RUN Sandbox (@{replace(replace(replace(item()?['Url'], '.', '[.]'), 'https://', ''), 'http://', '')}).


Link to analysis report: https://app.any.run/tasks/@{variables('UUID')}

The OS of the following hosts is not supported by the workflow: @{body('Select_-_unsupported_hosts')}


If a file contained in the incident's Entities is located at one of the hosts from this list, it will not be sent for analysis to ANY.RUN Sandbox.
